Toggle Menu

salt.modules.useradd

Manage users with the useradd command

add

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.add(
								name,
								uid=None,
								gid=None,
								groups=None,
								home=None,
								shell=None,
								unique=True,
								system=False,
								fullname='',
								roomnumber='',
								workphone='',
								homephone='',
								createhome=True,
								loginclass=None
								)

Details

Add a user to the minion

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.add name <uid> <gid> <groups> <home> <shell>

chfullname

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chfullname(
								name,
								fullname
								)

Details

Change the user's Full Name

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chfullname foo "Foo Bar"

chgid

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chgid(
								name,
								gid
								)

Details

Change the default group of the user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chgid foo 4376

chgroups

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chgroups(
								name,
								groups,
								append=False
								)

Details

Change the groups this user belongs to, add append to append the specified groups

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chgroups foo wheel,root True

chhome

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chhome(
								name,
								home,
								persist=False
								)

Details

Change the home directory of the user, pass True for persist to copy files to the new home dir

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chhome foo /home/users/foo True

chhomephone

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chhomephone(
								name,
								homephone
								)

Details

Change the user's Home Phone

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chhomephone foo "7735551234"

chloginclass

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chloginclass(
								name,
								loginclass
								)

Details

Change the default login class of the user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chloginclass foo staff

chroomnumber

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chroomnumber(
								name,
								roomnumber
								)

Details

Change the user's Room Number

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chroomnumber foo 123

chshell

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chshell(
								name,
								shell
								)

Details

Change the default shell of the user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chshell foo /bin/zsh

chuid

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chuid(
								name,
								uid
								)

Details

Change the uid for a named user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chuid foo 4376

chworkphone

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.chworkphone(
								name,
								workphone
								)

Details

Change the user's Work Phone

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.chworkphone foo "7735550123"

delete

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.delete(
								name,
								remove=False,
								force=False
								)

Details

Remove a user from the minion

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.delete name remove=True force=True

get_loginclass

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.get_loginclass(
								name
								)

Details

Get the login class of the user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.get_loginclass foo

getent

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.getent(
								refresh=False
								)

Details

Return the list of all info for all users

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.getent

info

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.info(
								name
								)

Details

Return user information

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.info root

list_groups

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.list_groups(
								name
								)

Details

Return a list of groups the named user belongs to

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.list_groups foo

list_users

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.list_users( )

Details

Return a list of all users

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.list_users

rename

Syntax

salt.modules.useradd.rename(
								name,
								new_name
								)

Details

Change the username for a named user

CLI Example:

salt '*' user.rename name new_name
